title: Can emotions control the thoughts? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm not sure exactly how to answer regarding this ideology of thoughts or emotions being two separate entities. I believe they are one in the same. Furthermore, control is an illusion. There's far too much going on externally and internally to believe it could all be controlled particularly when others are involved. So I suppose with all that considered…my answer would be no.
Thoughts and feelings are very much intertwined. People are often led by their emotions.
